name: Magna Vulpes (ursa-bit.exe)
description:
Magna Vulpes

In this game you play as a fox. You end the game by collecting 20 food pieces and finding the 3 fox cubs in the forest.
It has a tutorial, a summer mode and a winter mode and a time cycle between night and day.

You are able to explore the forest at your own pace, as there are no threats.

This is a 3D game made by K9 Unity. I was part of the team, as a 3D artist. All the 3D assets from this game are made by me, using 3ds Max, including rigs and animations.

The game was done for our client -- Liminal VR.
